upload_callout_1: You can manually add transactions to your Marble instance from this page by uploading a .csv file here.
upload_callout_2: The .csv file must follow the same schema as defined in your data model. We have build a template that you can use to get started quickly.
success_message: {{linesProcessed}} transactions will be added to your data
failure_additional_message: No transactions were added to your data
